column2: UPDATE 2-Samsung offers to stop seeking patent injunctions in Europe BRUSSELS
column3: Oct 17 Samsung Electronics  has offered to stop taking rivals such as Apple Inc to court over patent disputes in a move which EU antitrust regulators hope will end the so-called patent war between tech companies in Europe.

column2: Analysis: Debt fight dings U.S. Treasury bills' status NEW YORK The safe-haven reputation of U.S. Treasury bills took a beating during the latest debt ceiling fight in Washington
